cfbscrapR 0.1.5

Lists all teams in conference or all FBS Current support only for D1

cfb_team.Rd

Lists all teams in conference or all FBS Current support only for D1

cfb_team(conference = NULL, fbs_all = T, year = NULL)

Arguments

conference

Conference (Select a valid conference, D1 football)

Examples



cfb_team(conference="SEC")
#>      id            school       mascot abbreviation       alt_name1 alt_name2
#> 1   333           Alabama Crimson Tide          ALA            <NA>       ALA
#> 2     8          Arkansas   Razorbacks          ARK            <NA>       ARK
